content.rendered:
Dynamic Progressives for Customised Wider Near Vision

iFlex is a specially customised advanced progressive lens designed to provide wider near vision along with wide intermediate ideal for every day work. This innovative design offers highly comfortable reading zone and a wide field of view through the intermediate.

Features



  • Customised for enhanced near vision
  • High clarity in reading zone with full addition
  • Wider reading zone and comfortable intermediate
  • Maximised postural comfort
  • Higher the pixel higher the resolution
  • Better balance between left and right eye
  • Highly refined progression to deliver excellent

Ratings




Ask for Yash O&L Authenticity Card for your lenses

Lens Design
